content: here s a chihuahua amigurumi true to life he s fun to carry around with you wherever you go and will be your best friend i hope you have fun with this free crochet pattern and it becomes a chi-wow-wow for you i tried to make him true to chihuahua size as well so although compared to other dogs he may be small although not to his mind in amigurumi size he s a relatively large doll his features include his perky ears skinny legs and a cute snout be sure to tag me with your projects on instagram 1 or facebook 2 i d love to see ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** easy intermediate **size ** approximately 10in/25cm tall including ears **need to know ** crochet in the round single_crochet half_double_crochet increase and decrease assembly of parts 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan
